file.name: api.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: Hancock wallet hub version: "7.0.3" description: "Wallet hub allows you to send transactions to DLT and to sign the transactions with the help of a sign provider service previously configured \n \n Current blockchains supported {dlt} `ethereum` " contact: name: BBVA Hancock url: https://github.com/BBVA/hancock-wallet-hub license: name: Apache 2.0 url: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html servers: - url: https://host/{version}/wallet-hub host: "https://host/{version}/wallet-hub" paths: /{dlt}/sign-tx: post: tags: - "/{dlt}/sign-tx" operationId: Sign transaction description: Method for sign raw transactions through a sign provider. consumes: - "application/json" parameters: - name: dlt in: path description: Dlt to work with required: true schema: type: string requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/signRequest' description: Sign request schema to request the signature required: true responses: '200': description: Sign success content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/signResponse' '400': description: Bad request content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/genericError' '500': description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/genericError' /{dlt}/send-signed-tx: post: tags: - "/{dlt}/send-signed-tx" operationId: Send signed transaction description: Method for send a signed raw transactions to the dlt. consumes: - "application/json" parameters: - name: dlt in: path description: Dlt to work with required: true schema: type: string requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/sendSignReqest' description: Send signed request schema to send to dlt required: true responses: '200': description: Send signed success content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/sendSignResponse' '400': description: Bad request content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/genericError' '500': description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/genericError' /{dlt}/send-tx: post: tags: - "/{dlt}/send-tx" operationId: Send transaction description: Method for send raw transactions to dlt. consumes: - "application/json" parameters: - name: dlt in: path description: Dlt to work with required: true schema: type: string requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/sendRequest' description: Send request schema to send to dlt required: true responses: '200': description: Send success content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/sendResponse' '400': description: Bad request content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/genericError' '500': description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/genericError' components: schemas: genericResponse: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' description: Generic Response Schema type: object properties: result: type: object properties: code: description: "Api code" type: string description: description: "Description about the api code" type: string required: - code - description required: - result example: result: code: 20X description: "DLT - Operation successfully requested" genericError: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' description: Generic Response Schema type: object properties: error: description: "Identification error code" type: string internalError: description: "Hancock error code" type: string message: description: "Hancock message" type: string extendedMessage: description: "Detailed message" type: string required: - error - internalError example: error: 400 - 500 internalError: "HKAD5000X" message: "Call Error" extendedMessage: "Error: Description" signRequest: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' description: Sign request schema type: object properties: provider: description: "Alias of the provider signature" type: string rawTx: type: object properties: nonce: description: "Nonce assigned to transaction" type: string from: description: "Address of the sender in the DLT" type: string gas: description: "Gas value of transaction" type: string to: description: "Address of the receiver in the DLT" type: string gasPrice: description: "Gas estimated" type: string value: description: "Value of Weis to be transferred" type: string data: description: "Information about the transfer" type: string chainId: description: "Identifier number of the petition" type: number required: - provider - rawTx example: provider: "fakeprovider" rawTx: to: "0xcffffffffffffff000000000000000000000000" from: "0xcffffffffffffff000000000000000000000001" data: "transaction" value: "2" gasPrice: "0x3b9aca00" nonce: "0x642" gas: "0x5208" chainId: 1 signResponse: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' description: Sign response schema type: object properties: success: description: Boolean object to indicate that signer provider take in the order type: boolean required: - success example: success: true sendSignReqest: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' description: Send signed request schema type: object properties: tx: description: Raw transaction signed type: string required: - tx example: tx: "0xf865820642843b9aca008252089410578a2886306b0fc551c79e85a723f3418ca0d502801ca0c089da6d1e8b665def3d53d4c2cb79ff51742ecbc95580420922ee4a599ee73ba041102ef1cffd00c6a731c604a64742bcab70362dc7d081139946c867440104cc" sendSignResponse: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' description: Send signed response schema type: object properties: success: description: Boolean object to indicate that signer provider take in the order type: boolean transactionHash: description: Transaction hash give us by dlt type: string required: - success - transactionHash example: success: true transactionHash: "0x69cc5e3d33f1c12944b31b4953fc7a0301a42da1f48e7c35e3cdf114f4b3cb0e" sendRequest: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' description: Send request schema type: object properties: tx: type: object properties: nonce: description: "Nonce assigned to transaction" type: string from: description: "Address of the sender in the DLT" type: string gas: description: "Gas value of transaction" type: string to: description: "Address of the receiver in the DLT" type: string gasPrice: description: "Gas estimated" type: string value: description: "Value of Weis to be transferred" type: string data: description: "Information about the transfer" type: string chainId: description: "Identifier number of the petition" type: number required: - tx example: tx: to: "0xcffffffffffffff000000000000000000000000" from: "0xcffffffffffffff000000000000000000000001" data: "transaction" value: "2" gasPrice: "0x3b9aca00" nonce: "0x642" gas: "0x5208" chainId: 1 sendResponse: $schema: 'http://json-schema.org/schema' type: object description: Send response schema properties: success: description: Indicate if dlt network accepts the transaction type: boolean txReceipt: description: A payload with the transactions fields type: object properties: contractAddress: description: "The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation, otherwise null" type: string gasUsed: description: "Gas value of transaction" type: number cumulativeGasUsed: description: " The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block" type: number logsBloom: description: "The bloom filter for the logs of the block" type: string logs: description: "Array of log objects, which this transaction generated" type: array status: description: "True if transaction succeeded" type: boolean blockHash: description: "Hash of the block where this transaction was in" type: string blockNumber: description: "Block number in wich registered the transaction" type: number transactionIndex: description: "Transactions index position in the block" type: string transactionHash: description: "Hash of the transaction" type: string required: - success - txReceipt example: success: true txReceipt: transactionHash: "0x80b0617a5e4865cc99d05106fe2c57c922c6fdbe9fa04c7ba37c9c44b68eddad" transactionIndex: 0 blockHash: "0x10488ec191a8da55394450e645218eab871c3cb278ee4b759723da7db92b9e10" blockNumber: 153 gasUsed: 21000 cumulativeGasUsed: 21000, contractAddress: null logs: [] status: true logsBloom: ""

Error: parse: parse spec: parse servers: at raml/api.yaml:16:10: path parameter not specified: "version"
